product_vision: Multi-agent LLM financial trading framework that mirrors real-world trading firm dynamics for research-based market analysis and trading decisions

architecture.testing_strategy: Domain-specific: mocks for services, real DB for repositories, pytest-vcr for HTTP

core_components.NewsService: Business logic with company/global news context
core_components.NewsRepository: Async PostgreSQL with batch upsert, vector embeddings
core_components.GoogleNewsClient: RSS feed client for live data

dagster_status: Planned but not implemented - documentation references exist but no pipeline code

technical_patterns.async_operations: All repository methods async with session management
